document_data.name: Sundarth
document_data.mainbody: [[Sundarth]] was a [[Zhentarim]] [[mage]] of the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Manshoon always considered Sundarth more ambitious than thoughtful. Sundarth was excited to report to him.
document_data.Activities: Sundarth formed part of a squad of [[Zhentarim]] mages.
document_data.Relationships: Other mages in the same squad to which Sundarth belonged were [[Chsalbreian]] and [[Arluth]].
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1357}}, Sundarth reported to [[Manshoon]], while the latter was in the middle of torturing [[Simron]], that a group of mages seeking [[spellfire]] in [[Sembia]] was attacked, first by [[Harpers]] and then by [[Cult of the Dragon]] forces. He named Arluth and Chsalbreian as casualties before Manshoon stopped him.
